unnormalised: Arrey shobai, return policy, thik toh? Etai jeno biriyanir jonno sahi masala select kora! Ami ekbar ekta saree online-e kinechilam, puro *dhoka*. Rong ta ekdom alada chilo! Bhaggo bhalo je oder ekta decent return policy chilo. Onam-er age refund ta pete hobe! Dilli-r dokandar *jane* return kati. Na hole 5000 taka noshto!
normalised: Arrey shobai, return policy, thik toh? Etai jeno biriyanir jonno sahi masala select kora! Ami ekbar ekta saree online-e kinechilam, puro dhoka. Rong ta ekdom alada chilo! Bhaggo bhalo je oder ekta decent return policy chilo. Onam-er age refund ta pete hobe! Dilli-r dokandar jane return kati. Na hole panch hajar taka noshto!
text: Arrey shobai, return policy, thik toh? Etai jeno biriyanir jonno sahi masala select kora! Ami ekbar ekta saree online-e kinechilam, puro *dhoka*. Rong ta ekdom alada chilo! Bhaggo bhalo je oder ekta decent return policy chilo. Onam-er age refund ta pete hobe! Dilli-r dokandar *jane* return kati. Na hole 5000 taka noshto!
